thread.title: BRIEF-Ranger Direct Lending Fund Says Investments For Future Will Consist Primarily Of Private, Asset-Backed Loans Sourced And Structured By Ares

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ranger Direct Lending Fund Says Investments For Future Will Consist Primarily Of Private, Asset-Backed Loans Sourced And Structured By Ares
text:
May 1 (Reuters) - Ranger Direct Lending Fund PLC:
* RANGER DIRECT LENDING FUND - TWENTY INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT FIRMS ENGAGED IN PROCESS AND A SHORTLIST OF SIX MET WITH BOARD IN MARCH AND APRIL
* IN VIEW OF DIRECTORS PROPOSAL MADE BY ARES MANAGEMENT LLC WAS STRONGEST
* RANGER DIRECT LENDING FUND - COMPANYâ€™S INVESTMENTS FOR FUTURE WILL CONSIST PRIMARILY OF PRIVATE, ASSET-BACKED LOANS SOURCED AND STRUCTURED BY ARES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
